sources.title: 1935 Held Einer Nacht ( Theo Lingen, Eric Ode)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1935. Held einer Nacht.  U.a mit Eric Ode und Theo Lingen

metadata.Plot: The tailor Florian Kerzl is immersed in the Middle Ages. When he spoils the celebrations for the 500th anniversary of the founding of the town of Zdislavice, he is banished from the town. So he moves in his armor to the nearby rui...
metadata.Writer: Hanns H. Fischer, Peter Francke, Jaroslav Kvapil
metadata.Actors: Vlasta Burian, Else Lord, Betty Bird
